named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.Product product WHERE product.name LIKE :name

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.Product product, IN(product.allSkus) sku WHERE sku.id = :skuId

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU_ONE_TO_ONE
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.ProductSku product WHERE product.sku.id = :skuId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.Product product, IN(product.allSkus) sku WHERE sku.id = :skuId AND product.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (product.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR product.activeEndDate = null) AND (product.archiveStatus.archived IS NULL OR product.archiveStatus.archived = 'N')

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU_ONE_TO_ONE
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.ProductSku product WHERE product.sku.id = :skuId AND product.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (product.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR product.activeEndDate = null) AND (product.archiveStatus.archived IS NULL OR product.archiveStatus.archived = 'N')

named-query.name: BC_READ_AUTOMATIC_PRODUCT_BUNDLES
named-query.query: SELECT productBundle FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.ProductBundle productBundle WHERE productBundle.autoBundle = :autoBundle AND productBundle.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (productBundle.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR productBundle.activeEndDate = null) AND (productBundle.archiveStatus.archived IS NULL OR productBundle.archiveStatus.archived = 'N')

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryProductXrefImpl categoryProduct WHERE categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.category.id = :categoryId AND categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate = null) AND (categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.archiveStatus.archived IS NULL OR categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.archiveStatus.archived = 'N') ORDER BY categoryProduct.displayOrder

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryProductXrefImpl categoryProduct WHERE categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.category.id = :categoryId ORDER BY categoryProduct.displayOrder

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_OUTGOING_URL
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.Product product WHERE (product.url = :url) OR (product.urlKey = :urlKey)
